ygData.subject: Re: Quick question
ygData.msgSnippet: No, area songs do not effect my party, only anyone within range in my PvP level. (only effects people I could actually attack) Sleep I am told by friends who
ygData.messageBody:
No, area songs do not effect my party, only anyone within range in my PvP level. (only effects people I could actually attack) Sleep I am told by friends who let me guinea pig them, says it works like a quick stun, they can't do anything for a second. I have not really been pked but have heard from people that bards are one of the hardest to kill, we have selo's of course which breaks root, and also Screech sends them running like mad in the other direction < g > I am sure there are other tips that would be helpful but since I havent really had the need to experiment I'm not sure what all would work the best.

Infiniti

PS I am level 28 bard on PvP server and Dud had some questions .
